conflictDescription: User Story A wants to receive all social invitations and calls freely without limits, while User Story B wants to block all app updates and installations to avoid unwanted changes. The conflict arises because allowing all app updates and installations can trigger notifications that may include social invitations, which User Story B wants to forbid.
userStoryASummary: As an older person, I want to receive all social invitations and calls freely, so I can stay connected without limits.
userStoryBSummary: As an older adult, I want to block all app updates and installations, so that I avoid unwanted changes and keep full control.

conflictDescription: User Story A wants ALFRED to send alerts frequently enough to keep motivation, but not too much. User Story B wants to block all app update notifications to avoid unwanted changes, which can reduce notification frequency. These two stories have conflicting expectations about how often notifications should appear.
userStoryASummary: As an older person who likes challenges, I want ALFRED to send alerts that keep me motivated without feeling too much.
userStoryBSummary: As an older adult, I want to block all app updates and installations, so that I avoid unwanted changes and keep full control.
